alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ozark and southeastern Taney Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Ava to 10 miles northwest of Price Place to 7 miles northwest of Ozark Isle. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake... Norfork Lake... Gainesville... Theodosia... Pontiac... Sundown... Noble... Willhoit... Tecumseh... Udall... Hardenville... Thornfield... Sycamore... Long Run... Isabella... Zanoni... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
